text: Memory of Siam GmbH is a wellness company based in Zurich, Switzerland. It was founded in 2013 and offers traditional Thai massages, wellness treatments, and therapeutic services focusing on pain relief. The company operates two studios in Zurich: one in the Seefeld district and another near Stadelhofen train station. of Siam was established in 2013 with the aim of bringing traditional Thai healing methods into an urban setting. The first studio was opened in the Seefeld area of Zurich, a central but quiet neighborhood near Lake Zurich. The location was chosen to offer a peaceful space for relaxation, away from the busy city atmosphere. Since its founding, the studio has become a known part of the local wellness scene. Many clients visit regularly, and the business has grown mainly through word of mouth. The company focuses on offering high-quality services and personal care. In 2023, a second studio opened near Zurich's Stadelhofen train station.
